committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Parks, Historic Preservation, and Recreation

official_title: A bill to provide for an interpretive center at the Civil War Battlefield of Corinth, Mississippi, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Corinth, Mississippi, Battlefield Act of 1995 - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to: (1) acquire lands in the vicinity of the Corinth Battlefield in Mississippi for, and construct, an interpretive center to commemorate and interpret the 1862 Civil War Siege and Battle of Corinth; and (2) administer such lands and center as part of the Shiloh National Military Park. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to provide for an interpretive center at the Civil War Battlefield of Corinth, Mississippi, and for other purposes.
